page--index.viewReports: Get a complete picture of your achievements

options.register_content: To register, click the "Register" button on the home page, then fill out the form with your details to create an account.
options.add_friend_content: Go to the user's profile and click the "Add Friend" or "Follow" button to follow their updates.
options.modify_account_content: To change account settings or delete it, go to the "Settings" section in the profile menu and select the corresponding option.
options.create_group_content: To create a group, go to the "Communities" section and click the "Create Community" button, then fill out the form with the necessary details.
options.change_avatar_content: To change the profile photo, open the profile settings and click on the current photo. Then select a new image from your gallery.
options.change_password_content: To change the password, open the account settings, select the "Security" section, and follow the instructions to change the password.
options.recover_account_content: If you forgot your password, click "Forgot Password?" on the login page, enter your email, and we will send you instructions to recover access.
